item.title: First Post
item.description: Today I’m setting up a website using Hugo with the Hermit theme and Github Pages. So it’s basically a test setup right now. I’m not sure yet what content will be delivered here, but I will figure it out down the road.
item.content:
Today I’m setting up a website using Hugo with the Hermit theme and Github Pages. So it’s basically a test setup right now.

I’m not sure yet what content will be delivered here, but I will figure it out down the road.
